overview:
Mr. McCullough is the former President and COO of $300 million Signature Brands (Mr. Coffee). He has 23 years in management at GTE Sylvania, including as VP/General Manager of a $500 million European lighting division and a $200 million U.S. division. He has extensive strategic, operational and financial experience in consumer products and manufacturing.

Mr. McCullough has served on the Board of Directors of Signature Brands, Inc. and SLI, Inc. (NYSE: SLI). He received a BSBA from John Carroll University and an MBA from State University of New York.
